comment: If you're looking for a low stress online summer class, this is it. 16 SmartBook reading assignments. The professor is organized and responsive. One group paper worth 100/450pts, but there's plenty of extra credit if your worried about your group grade. I finished the entire 8 week course by the end of June. Quizzes are lockdown browser no webcam.

Such an amazing professor! I took a Maymester with Professor Graham and I could go on and on about how much I enjoyed this class. The class is so simple, straightforward and he explains everything so well. He really engages the students, which I appreciate. The quizzes directly coincide with the PowerPoints and a group paper at the end. Take him!!!

Such an EASY A! There's Smartbooks, very easy quizzes (open note), and a 3 group assignments that are really simple. Group members are randomly selected. So glad I got lucky with this professor, made my life so much easier. Even sent an email saying I had one of the highest grades in the class which I thought was really nice of him. What a breeze!
The best professor for MGT 3100. He is the bar, and it's all downhill from him.

This was the most amazing professor and course I have ever taken. I took a May-mester with Graham and he made very minute so enjoyable. I genuine was excited to be in class everyday. There are only a couple of quizzes and all the info is on the slides. Easy group project and he gives students lots of time to work on it. Please, please take him!!

I took his class as a paymaster we were graded on quizzes, which are open note and one group assignments. His lectures aren't drawn out and are engaging. We usually don't go the full time maybe 2.5 - 3 hours out of the 6. Solid teacher and an easy A tbh.
Lowman was a great professor! There were weekly smart books and quizzes. The quizzes are open book and you have 2 attempts. The only other thing in the group project which is super easy. Easy A

I love the way he had this class set up. He cares about his students success, and gives a reasonable amount of work. This class does have a group project that is fairly easy. Its only frustrating if you have a bad group. Overall, I genuinely enjoy this class. Definitely take his class.
Took Professor Lowman during the summer and his class was very manageable and easy. I definitely recommend taking his class.

He is a great professor!! Attendance is mandatory but his lectures are very i formational. He gives 2 attempts on everything which really helps improve your grade. Tests are easy and he gives you all the information you need to study. Take him!! :)

Professor Graham is a great professor. He always comes to class in a great mood and teaches the lectures well. The tests are easy, and does a Kahoot practice before the exam. The homework is somewhat numerous but easy nonetheless. There is also a project but it's fairly straightforward. Would recommend, take this professor if you can.

Truly knows what he's talking about. Attendance is mandatory but you get a couple skip passes. Exams are straight off his review sessions. Not much homework at all. Gives a ton of extra credit, I think almost a letter grade of potential extra points. Good class for a fairly easy A. You can really learn a ton from him, good guy/role model in general

Best professor hands down! He is understanding if you have any issues. 3 exams and 1 project. He does take attendance grade. Show up to class, take notes, and don't miss kahoot reviews bc the exams are exactly off of it. Group project is easy as long as your team members are putting in effort. And he looks like Rick from the Bachelorette
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Lowman is one of my favorite professors I have ever taken. He won't just hand out an A but he gives you everything you need to get one and all he expects is that you show up and try a little bit. He really cares and doesn't want to overload you with work. Group project isn't super big and you wont need to do any huge papers. He's great.

Professor Lowman was great! He makes learning fun and interesting and grades lightly. He does a realistic project and cares a ton about his students as well as how he can improve his course in the future. I will 100% take him again if given the chance. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR

By far the easiest class I have taken so far. Attendance is mandatory but you have three skip days if you don't want to go. One large group project, a few small assignments, and 3 exams. The day before the exam he does a Kahoot where he goes over exactly what is on the exam and you can take pictures. If you show up you'll pass. TAKE HIM NOW!

This is the second class I took with Prof Lowman. Do not regret it at all! I planned my schedule around his class and wouldn't hesitate to do it again. He is great about teaching all material with all learning styles in mind. He wants you to learn and be successful! It is obvious that he puts time and thought into all his lectures.

One of the best professors I've ever had! He is very passionate about what he teaches and truly cares about his students. He makes Kahoots to help students study for his tests and there is a group project you're given to work on throughout the semester but as long as you meet the deadlines its not bad at all. I recommend taking him!

Professor Lowman is an excellent professor. He genuinely cares about your success, and he wants to see you do well. He uses Kahoot reviews and fill-in-the-blank PowerPoints during lectures. Offers an extra credit project. If you have to take MGT 4002 and haven't registered for it yet, Dr. Lowman is the right choice.

Really nice guy. He seems to care a lot about his job and reputation which carries into how he treats his students. There weren't that many assignments, a large portion of the grade comes from attendance, so show up. Overall, I enjoyed my time a lot with Dr. Lowman, and you will too. Take him if you can!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Perfect professor for this class! Theres a group project(he picks the group), 3 tests, and in class participation activities. He is so caring and nice. Show up to every class and there will be no reason to not get an A!

Dr. Lowman is still pretty new to KSU, but he is possibly the best professor I've ever had. He really cares and engages with his students. I tried to take his class again next semester, but they switched his schedule. Easy class.
